name: The Vaccine
description:
You take on the role of a researcher, in the point where the pandemic has just begun in his city actively trying to find a cure for the pandemic, fill his shoes and do the tasks as you find the cure  and  survive the pandemic

The pandemic simulation is custom made in Godot, derived from https://github.com/GT-DILAC/unityengine,

https://github.com/GT-DILAC/htmlengine

and all the in game data used for calculations are derived form here as 

well i.e 

Transmission rate(5% without mask, 2% with mask), risk formula , etc
